item.title: polygenic risk score
item.description: TLDR? A polygenic risk score (PRS) is a way to estimate an individualâ€™s genetic predisposition to a certain trait or disease by combining the effects of many genetic variants across the genome.

item.title: REGENIE (Complete)
item.description: What it is Essentially, it is a tool that allows you to test GWAS signals/genetic instrument associations while accounting for ancestry.

item.title: bed file format
item.description: The .bed format is a binary file format that can be generated using Plink2.

item.title: PLINK (Complete)
item.description: For some useful PLINK Code, see Download PLINK 2 PLINK is a popular open-source genetic data analysis tool primarily used in genome-wide association studies (GWAS) and population genetics.

item.title: Piping File Contents to Ollama3
item.description: Use this code to pipe a fileâ€™s contents directly to llama3: Get-Content "filepath" | ollama run llama3 "prompt" .

item.title: Sea Born's Data Visualisation Code
item.description: To import sea born, use import seaborn To plot a histogram, use seaborn.histplot(data = data, x="Name of Column with numerical value", hue="Name of y axis variable", binwidth = 2, multiple="stack") seaborn.histplot() takes data as a pandas table, and subsequent argument...
